title: RGIII to Browns & Draft talk with Daniel Jeremiah
itunes:title: RGIII to Browns & Draft talk with Daniel Jeremiah
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler discuss the latest news from the NFL, including Robert Griffin III signing with the Cleveland Browns. Then, NFL Media’s and co-host of the “Move the Sticks” podcast Daniel Jeremiah joins the show to break down the 2016 NFL Draft.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
